summary: Changes Nazeem, Heimskr and Rolff Stone-Fist into trolls
descriptionHtml:
This mod changes Nazeem, Heimskr and Rolff into Frosttrolls (into Trollzeem, Trollskr and Troll Stone-Fist to be exact). I removed the essential tag from Rolff and the crime faction (no bounty when you kill them). They still talk. 

I changed their inventory a bit (might change it a bit more later), Trollzeem has a Glass Dagger, Trollskr a Daedric Dagger, Troll Stone-Fist a enchanted Daedric Dagger and the Skeleton Key. I left their loot to be vanilla.

The troll retex is from here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15708
author: YuanMonos
